member.name: currentLocation
member.doc: A reference to a location object which represents the current location in the trip.

member.name: destination
member.doc: A reference to a location object which represents the destination of the trip.

member.name: timeLeft
member.doc: The time left in seconds for getting from the currentLocation to the destination

member.name: distanceLeft
member.doc: The distance left in meters between the currentLocation and the destination
